Użyj tego narzędzia w celu detekcji samolotu, który jest poza wybranymi limitami. Wprowadź zero (0), aby usunąć ograniczenie.
Chcesz stworzyć zakładkę zawierającą obecnie wybrane elementy i punkt widzenia.
Weź udział w odprawie razem ze znajomimi z eskadry!
Nie zapomnij otworzyć ten port na swoim routerze!
Możesz połączyć się z adresami IPv4 i IPv6
Tylko Tacview Advanced może udostępnić odprawę online.
Dowolna zarejestrowana wersja Tacview może podłączyć się do sesji odprawy.
Brak pewnych danych; Załadowałeś poprawny plik dla tej odprawy?
⚠ Nie udało się podłączyć, sprawdź adres i numer portu.
⚠ Nie udało się udostępnić sesji. Użyj innego portu, aby udostępnić kilka sesji na tym samum komputerze.
⚠ Protokół nie wspierany. Używasz tej samej wersji Tacview?
⚠ Błędne hasło. Probowałeś skopiować/wkleić hasło, aby uniknąć literówek?
naciśnij Alt+Enter aby przełączyć w tryb pełnoekranowy
A valid password is required for this connection

A password may be required to join a private session

Fix selected object telemetry time, or create a ghost mode to compare performances.

Activate the joystick axis you want to use for this command.
Show the entire profile on screen
Automatically find the slowest frame and its bottleneck

Merge an existing flight recording with all the data currently loaded.
Save flight recording in highly compressed format.

Set Falcon 4.0 theater to use for VHS files. (Aegean, Balkan, Israel, Korea...)
Tacview will execute all specified operations then exit without displaying any window.
Connect real-time telemetry using the last known parameters.
Connect specified remote control using the last known parameters.
Tacview will be closed after all other specified operations have been completed.
Disable Vertex Buffer Objects to avoid crashes on some ATI CrossFire configurations.
Displays debug information to help fixing bugs.
Stores user preferences in a specific set for each instance of Tacview.
To prevent Tacview from saving UI settings on exit.
Returns -1 to the caller if all of the opened files are authentic.
Activate Tacview for the current user with the provided key.
Activate Tacview for the entire system with the provided key.
Activate Tacview, for the current session only, with the provided key.
Display the frame-rate in the 3D view

Declares an additional custom folder from where to load add-ons

Select secondary object from the 3D view
A new version of Tacview is available!
When this icon is visible, all flights are automatically recorded by your flight simulator. It is not necessary to keep Tacview running while you are flying.
Please update your graphics card driver

Playback of this file has been delayed by {0} minutes by the host. The last {1} minute(s) cannot be reviewed.
This file is authentic, it has not been altered since its recording.
This file is authentic, except for the last {0} seconds which cannot be validated.

To ensure fair play and to prevent cheating, please close IL-2 Sturmovik before using Tacview.

Are you sure you want to remove all telemetry beyond {0}?
Please read the following license agreement carefully. You must scroll down to its end to continue.
To register your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character key you have received by email. If you do not have a product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.

To upgrade your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character Tacview Advanced key you have received by email. If you do not have a Tacview Advanced product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a Tacview Advanced product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.
Buy a new product key online
This product key is not valid. Please check the key and try again.

Your copy is now registered. Keep your product key in a safe place in case you ever need to reinstall your Tacview.
In addition to many exclusive advanced features, you now have priority technical support as well as privileged access to updates and previews of future versions of Tacview 2.x.
Learn more about the advantages of using a registered copy of Tacview
To use this feature or version of Tacview you need to upgrade your license.
To use this feature or version of Tacview you need a Tacview Advanced license.
Export telemetry data in a file readable by other tools. Properties are expressed in meters and degrees. The accuracy of calculated properties depends on recorded data availability and precision.

Export script removing has failed¤Please ensure that you have write access to '{0}' folder.

{0} has entered the area close to {1}
File '{1}' not found.¤Please ensure that the given flight recording is accessible and available.
'{1}' is an invalid file name.¤Please retry with a well formatted or a simplier file name.
Invalid file format.¤'{1}' is not a flight recording or it is not well formatted.
Invalid file.¤'{1}' seems to have been corrupted.
Out of memory.¤Try to close some applications then retry.¤(This flight recording may also be too huge.)
The file format of '{1}' is not supported.¤Check the official website to know if there is a newer version of Tacview or another edition which can read this file.
Invalid file format.¤One required parameter is missing.
Invalid file format.¤Some parameters are invalid.
Unsupported file format.¤'{1}' may be created with a newer version of Tacview.
Invalid file format.¤One unit is still referenced after having left the area.
'{1}' is empty.¤Please ensure that the export script is properly installed and not disabled by the online server you are playing on.
Invalid path.¤Please ensure that the given flight recording '{1}' is accessible and available.
Invalid file name.¤Please retry with a well formatted or a simplier file name.
Invalid path.¤Please ensure that the target path is accessible and available.
Out of memory.¤Try to close some applications then retry.
Disk full.¤Remove some files then retry.
Sharing Violation.¤Ensure that this file is not already in use by another application.
